title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes this NFL team needs to wake up and make good with their star quarterback before it's too late. He talks about Kevin Durant's comments after getting swept in the first round of the playoffs and what this says about his desire to be one of the greatest of all time. He reveals his mock draft with some surprising picks inside the top 10. Plus, NFL on Fox analyst Jimmy Johnson joins the show to give his philosophy on team building ahead of tomorrow's draft. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
